about_the_game:
1878. An alternate steampunk reality.
The Flood has swallowed everything. The world turned into an endless ocean. The survivors have learned to create mobile islands - 'Isla Muvimi' for trade and communication.
You will have to travel across the vast seas in search of the mythical continent. Battles at sea and in the air, mysteries of the underwater depths and the search for allies await the player in order to survive in this difficult world.
Build and develop your mobile island - 'Isla Movimi' - and take it on an endless journey.



Key features of the game (ENG):
- Build and manage your floating base island.
- Control your battle turrets, plane and bathyscaphe.
- Explore the vastness of the ocean, battle enemies and search for amazing secrets in the world of Sea Walker Saga.
- An exciting plot inspired by the movie 'Waterworld' starring Kevin Costner.
- The main character grows stronger and smarter as he gains experience with the player.

short_description: An exciting steampunk adventure with strategy and RPG elements. Fight pirates, explore the seabed, build your own battle island and set out into the vast world ocean in search of a mythical continent!
